definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Water and soil loss is an important landforms evolution course.

sentences.english: A intelligence system for the analysis of river and sea physiognomy is presented in this paper.

sentences.english: Belongs to the desert of natural scenic spot, is a crescent hill chain or division high landscape.

sentences.english: These landforms were dubbed tiankeng, or "naturally formed pits".
sentences.chinese: 这些地貌现象被称作天坑，或者“自然形成的坑洞”。

sentences.english: According to its spatial distribution patterns and regional differences, three major Danxia landform concentrated areas in China are identified in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了三大丹霞地貌集中分布区的景观异质性。

sentences.english: The distribution was consistent with local yield and landform.

sentences.english: Professor Shen Yuchang is a famous geographer and outstanding geomorphologist in China.
sentences.chinese: 沈玉昌教授是我国著名的地理学家和杰出的地貌学家。

sentences.english: The ancient glacial remains in Taibaishan was glacial relief area, which was remained very well in the East of China.
